articles.description: In Other Waters, from developer Jump Over The Age, is a unique game that takes place entirely on a map interface. It’s out now on Windows PC and Nintendo Switch.
articles.content:
I know so much about Gliese 677Cc, the planetary setting of In Other Waters. The alien ocean is a weird, wonderful ecosystem of strange stalks, spores, and creatures scattered among its depths. 
Ive noticed the odd behavior of the oceans flora and fauna. Ive… [+5874 chars]

articles.title: When And Where To Watch Fortnite’s Travis Scott Concert: Full Schedule, Show-Times, And Dates For Astronomical - Forbes
articles.description: Here's when and where to watch the Travis Scott 'Astronomical' concert in 'Fortnite'. Check here for dates, full schedule, show-times and how to watch.
articles.content:
Fortnite
credit: Epic Games
Its a big one. Fortnite has had a concert once before, but the Marshmello concert happened at a time when you could, if you wanted to, go to a real concert. Not so this time around: Travis Scotts Astronomical concert comes with a… [+1780 chars]

articles.title: Moving Out Review - IGN
articles.description: Enjoyably tense and frequently hysterical, Moving Out is a must play for fans of same-screen multiplayer games. Reviewed by Tristan Ogilvie on Nintendo Switc...
articles.content: Enjoyably tense and frequently hysterical, Moving Out is a must play for fans of same-screen multiplayer games. Reviewed by Tristan Ogilvie on Nintendo Switch. Also available on PlayStation 4, Xbox One and PC.
